column5: Basic room with attached private bathroom/shower in a 3-bedroom one-story home. Very close to Texas A&M, easy access to FM 2818. Comfy queen bed, quiet and dark room, bleached sheets and towels, private bath and access to other common areas of the house. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets). Very inclusive people, all are welcome!
